action.action-desc: Mr. Lipinski introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to include individuals participating in pre-apprenticeship programs offered by employers and provide that such employers may be reimbursed under such Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Apprenticeship Improvement Act of 2017.
The Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (29 U.S.C. 3101 et seq.) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in section 3(44), in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by inserting , including an apprentice or pre-apprentice, after paid participant; and
in section 122(a)(2)(B), insert before the semicolon the following: , except that for purposes of this Act, such programs may include programs that include pre-apprentices.
